div.p: We would like to thank the participants in this research for generously donating their time and viewpoints. Public Health Institute staff and interns Azibuike Akaba, Alexis Captanian, Charlotta Chan, Courtney Gonzales, Anne Kelsey Lamb, Matthew Marsom, Jeni Miller, Y. Armando Nieto, Gabrielle Serra, and Valerie Tran contributed to the development of the research design, data collection, management, and analysis. Rachel Morello-Frosch, Carolina Reid, and Len Syme provided feedback on this paper during its formative stages. Support for this research was provided by the Kresge Foundation.
